name: plant.
description:
plant.

created for the ludum dare 50 compo. you trim the branches of a plant.

if you cut them too much, the plant dies.

if you don’t cut them, the plant still dies.

the theme 'delay the inevitable' made me sad, and this is the product of that sadness

source code here: https://github.com/cgsdev0/ludum-dare-50
